attributes.action: Give people transparency with the use of chemical spraying via Chemtrails.
attributes.additional_details: Two great documentaries can be found on YouTube entitled 'Why in the world are they spraying?' And 'What in the world are they spraying?' - most govt agencies deny its even happening, even whilst you watch it with your own eyes in the skies, and yet there is an extensive list of patents relating to chemical areosol use. The sun brings us light, warmth, photosynthesis and the much needed vitamin D which helps us absorb calcium. Demand transparency before they can continue.
attributes.background: Week upon week our sky is bombarded with chemical aerosols; barium, strontium and various metal oxides, all of which is falls to earth and right into our airway. We need to know what we are dealing with and why we are being sprayed over excessively.
